mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification SET notification_id=#{notificationId}, is_request=#{isRequest}, user_id =#{userId}, notification = #{notification}, data=#{data};
mapper.select: SELECT notification_id, is_request, user_id, notification, data FROM notification WHERE user_id=#{value} AND is_request=1;
SELECT notification_id, is_request, user_id, notification, data FROM notification WHERE user_id=#{value} AND is_request=0;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notification WHERE notification_id=#{value} AND is_request=1;
